title: Warwick got the best rework of all time
body:
Why?

Just look at this

https://lolskinshop.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/hyena-warwick-skin.jpg

He's got a fucking V8 engine on his back, and he can run in 300 km/h (186.41136 mph) 

how cool is that?

replies.body: A rioter commented on my post. I feel special
If [breakfast cereal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special_K) can be special, you can be special.

> [{quoted}](name=Abibyama II,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KM9IIiTH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-22T21:05:57.464+0000)
>
> A rioter commented on my post. I feel special

That's because you are special.
MY BODY IS CHROME AND MY BLOOD IS GASOLINE!!!
2,500 movement speed cuddly dog wants a hug badly.
compared to the other reworks which mostly failed its not so difficult to be the best

Yeah but he's not a killing machine with the right items, anymore. 

RIP On-hit doggo :'(
I know it is just a joke and all... But it is ironic that you chose my least favorite skin post-rework and my favorite skin pre-rework :D

> [{quoted}](name=Abibyama II,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KM9IIiTH,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-22T18:09:13.613+0000)

> he can run in 300 km/h (186.41136 mph) 


And if you can it is not true, just get him Zilean support, predator and Youmu, also his W.
He will be faster than a Bugatti
